body:
The only girl I wanted to see the most is the tall one from the army.
Sadly she's not part of the harem, therefore no doujin of her

Not that there's really much the colorizer(?) can do about that. Except maybe not provide updates until the work is completely finished. Then again, it could always be the person themselves making the uploads, huh...

My thoughts exactly, sir and/or madam. I've said this before, but I wish people would stop doing that. This person does excellent work "colorizing" doujinshi, but it's just annoying when people upload new galleries for each newly colored page...
why is this being reuploaded with like 1 color page at a time?
